headline: Kroger Makes Springing Forward Easier This Daylight Saving with Limited-Edition Hour Back Box and 39,000 Free Breakfast Items
summary: Customers can score free Kroger Hour Back Box filled with Our Brands breakfast essentials and more CINCINNATI, Feb. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Kroger Co. is making customers' daylight saving a...
